programme.title: The Grizzlie Truth
programme.desc: Superfan filmmaker Kat Jayme investigates the abrupt move of her NBA hometown team, the Vancouver Grizzlies, to Memphis in 2001. Much more than a sore spot, it's an unsolved mystery and possibly a criminal conspiracy. The investigation becomes a love letter to the worst professional sports franchise in history and an exploration into the deep roots of fandom.

programme.title: Live: College Football
programme.desc: A pair of 9-3 programs contest the Cure Bowl as the Bulls line up against the Monarchs. Old Dominion closed out the regular season with five straight wins to finish second in the Sun Belt East. South Florida won bowl games in 2023 and 2024.

programme.title: Live: College Football
programme.desc: The Blue Hens (6-6) and Ragin' Cajuns (6-6) come together in the 68 Ventures Bowl. Delaware ended the regular season by thumping UTEP 61-31 to secure a postseason appearance in its inaugural FBS campaign. Louisiana is 7-5 in bowl games since 2011.

The pair engage in high-energy discussions, conduct interviews and often argue over topics not even related to sports. Other sports reporters appear as guests and offer opinions on the top stories of the day.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A murdered 14-year-old girl leads the detectives to a prominent physician who specializes in reproduction therapy.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives suspect several young socialites of raping a girl at a Manhattan nightclub, then killing her.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A serial rapist is the main suspect when an expectant mother is abducted during a car jacking.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives investigate when two high-school basketball players are gunned down while shooting hoops in the gymnasium.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A psychiatrist specializing in the treatment of sex offenders is found badly beaten in a crack house and one of her recently paroled patients, the "Duct Tape Rapist," is the prime suspect.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives face off against a Colombian cartel and the Drug Enforcement Administration while investigating the brutal rape and murder of an undercover agent.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A dead newborn leads detectives to a dermatologist, then a serial pedophile.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler have the gruesome task of identifying the remains of a man and woman who were stabbed in a park.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The upsetting discovery of a teenage network revolving around sex, drugs and booze raises alarms for the Stablers about their own daughter.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Assistant DA Cabot jeopardizes the detectives' careers and her own when she exceeds legal limits to collect evidence against a serial child-abuser.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives investigate the rape/murder of a woman whose stepfather is a judge (Keir Dullea) known for his harsh sentencing of sex offenders.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Intelligence's investigation into a string of robberies targeting vulnerable immigrants escalates when a teenage girl connected to a critic of the CPD is kidnapped by the robbers.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Burgess finds herself in a difficult situation when she responds to a call while a civilian is in her car for a ride-along that was requested by Brennan.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Intelligence's investigation of a nightclub owner suspected of cocaine distribution is complicated when Ruzek recognizes someone close to him while working undercover.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: When the wife of an alderman is beaten to death, Voight finds himself under pressure from Brennan to close the case; Upton shares a dark episode from her past to elicit a confession.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Voight urges Halstead to remain impartial and follow the facts when the leader of a local mosque becomes the suspect in the bombing of an Army recruitment center.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: The stakes become personal for Atwater during Intelligence's investigation of a drug dealer suspected of homicide.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: As his dependency on prescription painkillers grows, Antonio crosses a line, endangering someone close to him and ultimately putting the entire team at risk.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: The surprising arrival of a new fire truck brings both joy and chaos to members of Firehouse 51; Boden and Severide are asked to make peace with an old foe for the greater good; Brett receives family news while Foster plans a party with friends.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: A series of mysterious gas leaks has members of Firehouse 51 puzzled and spread thin; Brett's conflicted when her birth mother gets serious about finding her; Severide misunderstands his role as Cruz's best man; Mouch bites off more than he can chew.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: A series of teen opioid overdoses sees Severide partner with Sean Roman, but he begins to suspect there's more to the story than his old friend is telling him; Casey tries to be there for Brett as she considers her birth mother's offer to meet.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Boden is on edge after starting a new fad diet; Casey and Severide disagree on a call; Brett's birth mother shares life-altering news; a familiar face has a proposition for Herrmann.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Things get personal for Casey and Gallo in the aftermath of a suburban house fire involving a mother and her young son; Herrmann campaigns for more respect; Kidd has an idea for giving back to her community.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Severide teams up with Seager and the OFI when a motel structure fire turns suspicious; Firehouse 51 members become amateur sleuths following a Reddit post involving one of their own; Brett continues to get invested in her birth mother, Julie.

programme.title: Live: Optum Golf Channel Games Pregame
programme.desc: Pregame coverage for skills competition featuring some of the best golfers in the world.

programme.title: Live: Optum Golf Channel Games
programme.desc: Scottie Scheffler and Rory McIlroy compete head-to-head and captain two teams of world-class players in this rapid-fire golf competition, featuring timed and strategy-focused challenges.

programme.title: Live: Optum Golf Channel Games Postgame
programme.desc: Postgame coverage for skills competition featuring some of the best golfers in the world.

programme.title: Champions
programme.desc: A former minor-league basketball coach receives a court order to manage a team of players with intellectual disabilities. Despite his doubts, he soon realizes that together they can go further than they ever imagined.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: When a young pregnant mother goes missing in Virginia, her family embarks on a frantic search, but the case eventually goes cold; years later, investigators speak with a woman who tells a harrowing story and may hold the key to solving the case.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: After a nurse and mother-of-three is murdered inside her Illinois home, investigators uncover security camera footage that could be key to solving the case.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: Amber Dubois disappears in the San Diego area and the search turns up nothing. A year later, Chelsea King disappears in a neighboring town. Investigators are determined to find out if the two cases are connected.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: Amber Dubois disappears in the San Diego area and the search turns up nothing. A year later, Chelsea King disappears in a neighboring town. Investigators are determined to find out if the two cases are connected.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The team races against time to save a naval commander's daughter after seeing a video of her being buried alive.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Callen's former partner (Marisol Nichols) takes hostages at a Navy recruitment center.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: After terrorists kill a state department employee and a plastic surgeon, the team searches for the only witness who can identify the killers' surgically altered faces.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detective Stabler races against time to determine if a convicted man on death row also murdered and raped another victim.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler clash with an assistant U.S. attorney (Pam Grier) when their rape victim and their prime suspect disappear into witness protection.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A boy, 5, is abducted from his bed in the middle of the night, prompting detectives to take a hard look at the boy's estranged father.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives interrogate a man who accuses his wife (Josie Bissett) of endangering the life of their unborn child through excessive drinking.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives investigate the murder of a gay man who was the poster boy for sexual re-education.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After a man's mutilation on the subway, detectives discover he has been abducting women for years and forcing them to live in his dungeon.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler and Capt. Cragen search for suspects after a missing infant is discovered badly beaten in the bushes at a local park.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler hit a wall of silence while questioning fraternity brothers about the murder and sodomy of their hard-nosed pledge master.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives investigate the rape and murder of two Arab-American women who were trying to improve relations among different groups.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives probe what looks like the ritualistic sacrifice of a 7-year-old Nigerian boy and uncover a slave-smuggling ring.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Family members become murder suspects when DNA tests on the body of a 16-year-old girl reveal evidence of incest.
